text: Miguel Filipe Machado de Albuquerque (born 4 May 1961) is a Portuguese politician of the Social Democratic Party (PSD) and the current President of Madeira. He became the leader of PSD in Madeira on 10 January 2015. He is a former mayor of Funchal, Madeira. Albuquerque said he likes gardening, growing many types of roses in his rose garden. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese politicians Category:People from Funchal
title: Miguel Albuquerque
